description:
50% off sale! For a limited time to celebrate 100,000 downloads of the free version of Paper Basketball, Paper Basketball Plus will be HALF OFF!

-- Now for ALL webOS devices. Including TOUCHPAD at HD resolution!  -- 

This plus version includes MANY new features such as:
- 6 Unlockable Stages!
- Chain Mode!
- Timed Mode!
- Moving Target mode!
- 30+ Challenges!
- High Score Saving.
- The Moral Superiority that comes from supporting indie palm pre development!

The classic sport played around the world by bored cubical workers - Office Basketball!  Completely redone, with new animations, physics, sounds & stages!

Grab your last bad idea, wad it up and take your shot! But be sure to take the breeze from the window into account! It’s an addicting time waster for those short breaks when you want a fun little distraction.

 Easy to play & hard to master, Office Basketball is addicting and simpleFun is not responsible for lost wages or damage to relationships caused by this game.

--- update log
1.7.1 - Now a universal application that will work on Pre, Pre+,Pre2, Pixi, Veer

1.5.9 - Improved Graphics, Better font rendering, other boring tech things.
